name: Tablar
content_security_policy: script-src https://api.openweathermap.org/ 'self' unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src * 'self' data: 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src https://source.unsplash.com/ https://images.unsplash.com/ https://cors-anywhere.herokuapp.com/; media-src https://source.unsplash.com/; object-src 'self'
